events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly with interest.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles for further processing and evaluation by the team.
A recruiter specialized in software development roles has been assigned to manage your application and next steps.
We completed the initial screening of your profile and found your experience relevant to the engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your interest and availability for the upcoming interview stages.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for June 7th at 14:00 UTC with one of our senior developers.
The technical interview went well, and the panel noted your strong problem-solving skills and coding ability.
Your HR interview is arranged for June 10th at 10:00 UTC to discuss your fit with company culture and benefits.
The HR interview concluded positively, with mutual interest expressed in moving forward toward an offer.
We have formally proposed an employment offer including compensation and benefits packages for your review.
Thank you for your feedback; we are glad you found the offer terms acceptable and are excited about joining.
You have accepted the offer, and we are delighted to welcome you aboard as part of our Engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, with access to resources and orientation scheduled for your first day.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We look forward to your success and contributions as part of the team.
